entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain before morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
